description: This table extends CLARITY_DEP, which contains high-level information about departments from the Department master file.

columns.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Department record.

columns.name: MED_REC_STYLE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The medication reconciliation style category ID for the department.


May contain organization-specific values: No

Inpatient Med Rec
